movie.title: Homeland
movie.actors: Claire Danes, Mandy Patinkin, Damian Lewis, Morena Baccarin
movie.plot: Carrie Mathison, a CIA operations officer, is on probation after carrying out an unauthorized operation in Iraq. As a result, she has been reassigned to the Counter terrorism center. Whilst in Iraq, she was warned that an American prisoner had been turned by Al-Qaeda. When Nicholas Brody, a U.S. Marine Sergeant, is rescued after being held hostage since 2003, she suspects that he is the turned American prisoner. Brody is received home as a war hero, so Carrie goes to any lengths possible, ignoring protocol, to catch him out.
movie.awards: Won 5 Golden Globes. Another 43 wins & 110 nominations.
